resources.string: Enter the Email address associated with your account.
We will email you a link to reset your password
What aspect/s of hiking do you like to experience most?
TrailBlaze utilizes your location to provide personalized suggestions of nearby trails, please enter your location.
How far would you like to receive suggested trails?
How would you like to interact with the community>
I would like my account to be found by others.
I would like my hiking experience shared with others and/or on leaderboards.
I would like to volunteer for creating and maintaining trails for my community.
I would like to be notified if someone is in danger or any potential danger is on a trail.
Please select your preferences for each of the categories listed below.
Your privacy is important to us. It is TrailBlaze policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, and other sites we own and operate.

We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why weâ€™re collecting it and how it will be used.
We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service.">
By signing in you are agreeing to our
If you are experiencing any issues, please let us know. We will try to solve them as soon as possible.
You can also contact us at

TrailBlaze aims to be the go-to application for all hikers, climbers, and outdoorsy types by offering a fantastic way to view trail options whether traveling or at home. With customization options, the latest updates on trails, and an expansive community, it is sure to be a standout in the space.
